DOC.brief_summary: In study follow hypothesis test : Electrical stimulation gluteal muscle ( buttock ) lead 1. increase thickness gluteal muscle 2. decrease thickness fat buttock area 3. change distribution middle maximal seating pressure consistent pressure 4. increase well-being patient .
DOC.brief_title: Electrical Stimulation Denervated Muscles After Spinal Cord Injury
DOC.criteria: Duration palsy : minimum two year traumatic nontraumatic spinal cord injury Level lesion : T 10 L 5 , AIS A , classified American Spinal Injury Association ( AISA ) Acute decubitus stimulate area Arteriosclerosis Less three month flap surgery decubitus stimulate area Infections skin eczema stimulate area
